Package com.xebisco.yield

Class PlatformInit

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.PlatformInit
public class PlatformInit extends Object
It's a class that holds the initial configuration of the specific platform.

    • setUndecorated

      public void setUndecorated(boolean undecorated)
      This function sets the undecorated variable to the value of the parameter undecorated.
      Parameters:
      undecorated - If true, the window will not have a title bar, close button, or window border.
